ai-anya-e0605n26:2_0: Thus he came to the Awakened One,
ai-anya-e0605n26:3_0: teach the Dhamma to the beginning.
ai-anya-e0605n26:4_0: which is connected with various different.
ai-anya-e0605n26:5_0: Therefore for a meditator should attain absorption no delight
ai-anya-e0605n26:7_0: When they have gained the world,
ai-anya-e0605n26:9_0: having understood the three kinds of passion,
ai-anya-e0605n26:15_0: one who continually uses others to urinate,
ai-anya-e0605n26:17_0: the host of gods and men,
ai-anya-e0605n26:19_0: In the ninth part of the city,
ai-anya-e0605n26:20_0: let the whole of the three realms,
ai-anya-e0605n26:22_0: of those who thought about the Fortunate One’s Dhamma,
ai-anya-e0605n26:23_0: For all the Buddhas’ virtues were pure in the special qualities of the Buddhas,
ai-anya-e0605n26:24_0: In brief, the ninety-four amongst the ninety-nine years
ai-anya-e0605n26:25_0: I will give (to you), reverend Sir,
ai-anya-e0605n26:27_0: The one who is reborn in a Worthy One,
ai-anya-e0605n26:28_0: the penetration of the Awakened One,
ai-anya-e0605n26:29_0: accomplished in knowledge and conduct, mindful,
ai-anya-e0605n26:30_0: the Holy One has gone to the end,
ai-anya-e0605n26:32_0: in this world and the next.
ai-anya-e0605n26:34_0: in the Teacher of gods and humans,
